name: Akshay Kumar
title: Software Engineer & AI Developer
summary: Software Developer with 5+ years of experience in building scalable applications and AI-powered solutions in healthcare and finance. Skilled in cloud-native development, Generative AI, Agentic AI, and delivering impactful products.

highlights: Building a personalized AI tutor using Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) and agentic AI workflows powered by LLMs.
Orchestrating multi-agent systems using LangGraph and CrewAI for dynamic learning experiences.
Shipping production-ready AI features across the stack using Python, LangChain, and Google Cloud.
Designed real-time data architecture integrating PostgreSQL and NoSQL pipelines with secure RESTful APIs.
Built backend services for reporting platforms using .NET Core and Python.
Migrated contract lifecycle reporting tools to Azure using Databricks and Spark for scalable ETL workflows.
Developed financial forecasting tools using .NET Core and Python-based pipelines.
Integrated AWS Glue and S3 for cloud-native ETL workflows.
Enhanced reporting platforms with real-time metrics and visual dashboards.
Contributed to large-scale financial platform managing 200,000+ accounts.
Built scalable backend APIs using C# and frontends in React.
Delivered critical modules in loan management and customer onboarding.

projects.name: Interactive Maps
projects.description: Migrated a fuel logistics interactive map from plain JavaScript to React, integrating pipelines, terminals, and refineries. Enhanced UI/UX and deployed to IIS with Excel data ingestion.

projects.name: Campus Resource Finder
projects.description: Built an NLP-driven multi-agent app using LLaMA 3, LangChain, and Supabase to help students navigate academic resources, Canvas integration, and coursework queries.
